Type:

Function

first_derivative(accuracy=0.01)[source]

Calculates the first derivative. Returns NumFunc object.

nth_derivative(n, accuracy=0.01)[source]

Calculates the nth derivative. Returns NumFunc object.

solve(accuracy=0.01, iterations=10, guess=1, inf=False)[source]

Solves the function for x

first_derivative(accuracy: float = 0.01)[source]

_summary_: Calculates the first derivative Calculates the first derivative. Returns NumFunc object. :param accuracy: The “dx” value in the derivative

nth_derivative(n: int, accuracy=0.01)[source]

Calculates the first derivative :param n: The order of the derivative :type n: int :param accuracy: The “dx” value in the derivative :returns: NumFunc object

solve(accuracy=0.01, iterations=10, guess=1, inf=False)[source]

Solves the function for x :param accuracy: The accuracy of the solution :param iterations: The number of iterations to run :param guess: The initial guess :param inf: If the output is a generator
